introduce_product: The new BGA230SA models are designed with a pink gold metallic finish for the face ring of the black and beige models, and a gold finish for the white model face ring. Simple designs are created with bands and cases made of matte materials that provide a look of simple style, which is offset by faces that incorporate metal components. The safari beige model creates the feel of setting out on an exciting adventure in a faraway land. Function-wise, these models come with Dual Dial World Time, which uses a small dial at 9 o'clock to show the current time in a second time zone.
list_specification_product: 31 time zones (48 cities + UTC), daylight saving on/off, home city/World time swapping
Measuring modes: Elapsed time, split time, 1st-2nd place times
Countdown range: 1 minute to 60 minutes (1-minute increments)
Hand shift feature (Hands move out of the way to provide an unobstructed view of digital display contents)
